name: peek-history
description: A simple and minimal extension for quickly peeking and managing history.

scripts.dev: parcel src/popup.html src/options.html src/js/popup.js src/js/options.js src/js/libs.js src/js/background.js src/css/style.scss
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist/* && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -a src/assets dist/
scripts.build: parcel build src/popup.html src/options.html src/js/popup.js src/js/options.js src/js/libs.js  src/js/background.js src/css/style.scss --no-content-hash --no-source-maps

author: Abdul Samad
